title: Luck?
body: Have i gotten worse at this game or not? Since if you go to the bottom of my match history i have won all my matches from one point and got fed, now the opposite is happening.

replies.body: If you think you're getting bad luck, try doing something else for a while as you may be on tilt without knowing

no it's just chance and probablity. you'll find that practically everyone, over-time (after a few hundred games played) will have a W/L of roughly 50%. so yeah ASSUMING you're being matched with roughly equal "skilled" players it is lucky to win lots of games in a row, and unlucky to lose lots of games in a row.
Maybe you are just paired with players who are around the same or higher level than you since you won a lot of games and your MMR increased.
